Operational Excellence

We manage the liability and logistics. You focus on business.

Audit-Ready Billing

Consolidated GST invoice with attached Fuel, Toll & Parking bills (at actuals). Mileage logged daily.

100% Statutory Compliance

We follow Central Govt Minimum Wages. PF & ESI filed diligently. Zero legal liability for you.

Strict Driver Vetting

Mandatory Police Verification Certificate (PVC) obtained for every driver and renewed every 2 years.

60-Min Backup Promise

Vehicle breakdown? Driver sick? A backup vehicle reaches your office in < 60 minutes.

Tamil Nadu Wide Support

Seamless fleet operations across Chennai, Coimbatore, Madurai, and Hosur under one contract.

Dedicated Fleet Manager

No call centers. Direct mobile access to a dedicated supervisor who manages your roster daily.
